alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:01PM MST until August 11 at 11:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MST FOR AREAS NEAR CEDAR RIDGE IN COCONINO COUNTY... At 700 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cedar Ridge, or 28 miles northwest of Tuba City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cedar Ridge, Coppermine Chapter House, and Gap. This includes U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 501 and 516. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
